title: Economic Stimulus, SCOTUS Nominee, 2020
itunes:title: Economic Stimulus, SCOTUS Nominee, 2020
description:
Guests: Kyle Dropp, Co-Founder and Chief Research Officer of Morning Consult, Michael Regan, Senior Editor and lead blogger for Bloomberg Markets Live, Tyler Deaton, Republican strategist and fundraiser, President of Allegiance Strategies, Laura Fink, Democratic Strategist and Founder & CEO of Rebelle Communications, and Dr. Shelby Steele, Robert J. and Marion E. Oster Senior Fellow at the Hoover Institution.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
